ygData.subject: RE: Bard Song Analysis Spreadsheet Available
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually I sometimes I wish I did have a taunting tune, esp when the cleric or enchanter in the group is getting pounded and the mobis too high to charm ...
ygData.messageBody:
Actually I sometimes I wish I did have a taunting tune, esp when the cleric
or enchanter in the group is getting pounded and the mobis too high to charm
:(
But I have always found it ironic that they felt we need a tuanting tune in
beta.

Rokenn


>From: "Kyle Sibbald" <ksibbald@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Song Analysis Spreadsheet Available
>Date: Thu, 30 Dec 1999 09:07:10 -0600
>
> Gah! I knew I'd find the paper after I sent the message!
>
> Disregard the thing on a brass song at level 11. The original was a
>singing
>song called Agitato's Taunting Tune that would effectively do a taunt on
>the
>target. A bard song that taunts the target. Wow, isn't that totally useful.
>How many songs do we have that do that. 15? 20? No wonder they took it out.
>:)
>
> Good Journey
>
> Sineras Silverlyre, The Divine Alliance (Cazic-Thule)
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Kyle Sibbald [mailto:ksibbald@...]
>Sent: Thursday, December 30, 1999 9:03 AM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Song Analysis Spreadsheet Available
>
>
>From: "Kyle Sibbald" <ksibbald@...>
>
> I think the reason we got brass at level 11 is because the current song
>for
>level 11 isn't the original. For the life of me I can't remember what the
>old one back in Beta4 was but I think it might have been a brass song.
>
> Good Journey
>
> Sineras Silverlyre, The Divine Alliance (Cazic-Thule)
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Valharick@... [mailto:Valharick@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, December 29, 1999 10:36 PM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Song Analysis Spreadsheet Available
>
>
>From: Valharick@...
>
>In a message dated 12/29/99 5:05:45 PM Pacific Standard Time,
>legba@... writes:
>
><< I just hit lvl 11 and got my brass skill. Am I wrong when I look at the
> song list, or is the first song I can use this for at lvl 18? Is there
> anyway to practice it? >>
>
>Nope your right. And nope there isnt. When I saw this I didnt train my
>brass
>skill until I got my 18th song. This gave me a lil boost in the skill as I
>started at 90 instead of 55 skill. A few less missed notes in the long run
>:)
>
>Renaldo of the now and forever 37th chorus
>
